titles.title: To increase Federal Pell Grants for the children of fallen public safety officers, and for other purposes.
Corporal Ronil Singh and Fallen Heroes Scholarship Act
Corporal Ronil Singh and Fallen Heroes Scholarship Act
Corporal Ronil Singh and Fallen Heroes Scholarship Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
